DOC.brief_title: Hypertension Control Based Home Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: The aim trial study effect antihypertensive therapy base home systolic blood pressure ( BP ) different target level use two class drug . The HOSP study multicenter , prospective , randomize , open , blind endpoint study . Inclusion criteria 40-79 year old treat untreated hypertensive patient without serious medical condition . After 4 week baseline period , subject randomly assign ( 1 ) modest control group ( target morning home BP < 140 mmHg ) ( 2 ) strict control group ( morning home BP < 130 mmHg ) , ( ) amlodipine group ( 2.5-5 mg od ) ( b ) losartan group ( 25-50 mg od ) . Additional antihypertensive drug ( diuretic , beta-blockers alpha-blocker ) use home BP control . Home BP measure early morning late evening . Primary end point combine cardiovascular events.The participant follow 5 year .
